sect2.title: Contents
sect2.para: The Ghostscript package contains gs, pstoraster and filters.

sect3.title: gs
sect3.para: gs is the ghostscript interpreter. It is responsible for rendering the postscript data.

sect3.title: pstoraster
sect3.para: pstoraster allows CUPS to filter output to non-postscript printers. It is built and installed if is found.
